title: [Health] Skin pigment affects oxygen monitor: researchers discovered that when oxygen saturation was between 92-96%, Black patients had an incidence of hypoxemia three times greater than white patients, and these patients also had a twice as likely incidence of hyperoxemia

[Neuroscience] Human Cerebral Organoids Can Integrate With the Rat Brain. Researchers created a new model system that involves transplanting human stem cell-derived brain organoids into the somatosensory cortex of newborn rats. The organoids wired into the rat brain and grew far bigger than organoids in dishes do.
